data.name: npgreat
data.description: A hybrid assembly method that utilizes Nanopore and Linked-Reads datasets for the assembly of the human subtelomere regions.

evidence: "NPGREAT is a hybrid assembly method that utilizes two complementary types of data for the assembly of the human subtelomere regions" (indicates a domain-specific analysis/assembly tool, i.e., an application).

"The manual of NPGREAT, containing detailed istructions on how to use the tool is located here" (suggests users run the tool directly rather than import it as a library or install via a package registry).
The repository is owned by a personal GitHub user account (owner_login: eleniadam) with no mention of institutional or community governance in the README, indicating an individual maintainer.
